title: Vision
text: Our commitment to understanding and meeting theneeds of our customers with the expectation of satisfaction from what we do. We serve the global energy industry for decades, providing world-class services such as inspections, technical audits, construction support sites, and assets all whileminimizing risks that can impact the safety of personnel and the environment. PT. ZEA ENGINEERING SERVIS (ZES) can be aworldwide partner in inspection, Civil BuildingConstruction, Selection and Placement Activities of Domestic and Foreign Workers, Private EngineeringEducation, Tank Industry, Water Tanks And Metal Containers, Repair Of Metal Products Ready To Install For Buildings, Tanks, Water Reservoirs And SteamGenerators, NDT Consultant. We aim to provide themost competitive and most productive service to our customers. As your technical service we can promiseglobal access to experience, expertise and innovationlike no other
